amendment.description: An amendment numbered 59 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to prohibit any funds from being used to conduct a competition analysis of mergers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 211 - 220 (Roll no. 615).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 211 - 220 (Roll no. 615).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
